DualResolutionGameImage - Class in petri.api
Holds both a High and Low res Image for use in drawing and collision detection, respectively.
DualResolutionGameImage(String, String) - Constructor for class petri.api.DualResolutionGameImage
Creates a new container of a High and Low res Image of name s, and generates an outline.
DualResolutionGameImage(String, String, String) - Constructor for class petri.api.DualResolutionGameImage
